title: AI Terms to Know About
image_desc:
A futuristic cityscape with glowing holographic displays showing data streams and AI interfaces. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
A stock footage video showing a fast-paced montage of technological advancements and AI-related imagery.
video_desc: A stock footage video showing a fast-paced montage of technological advancements and AI-related imagery.
narration: Welcome to this video on essential AI terms  We'll cover some key concepts you'll encounter frequently in the field of artificial intelligence

title: Heuristic Search Techniques
content:
Problem-solving method
Narrows search to optimal solutions
Eliminates inaccurate options
Increases speed and precision
image_desc:
A flowchart diagram illustrating a heuristic search algorithm, showing branching paths and the elimination of less promising options. Type: diagram

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Let's start with Heuristic Search Techniques This is a problemsolving method that efficiently finds optimal solutions by discarding less promising options making the process faster and more accurate

title: Black Box AI vs. Explainable AI (XAI)
content:
**Black Box AI**
Outputs are useful
Decisions and operations are unclear
**Explainable AI (XAI)**
Purpose, rationale, and decision-making are easily understood
Transparent and interpretable
image_desc:
A split image showing a complex, opaque black box on one side and a transparent box revealing inner workings on the other. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Next we have Black Box AI where the system provides useful results but its internal workings remain hidden  In contrast Explainable AI or XAI prioritizes transparency making its decisionmaking process understandable to everyone

title: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) & NLP
content:
**Robotic Process Automation (RPA):** Automates mundane, repetitive tasks.
**Natural Language Processing (NLP):** Focuses on human-computer language interaction.
image_desc:
An image depicting a robotic arm interacting with a computer screen, performing automated tasks alongside a graphic representing natural language processing. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Robotic Process Automation or RPA uses AI to automate repetitive tasks previously done by humans  Natural Language Processing or NLP is a crucial area focusing on how computers understand and interact with human language

title: TensorFlow, Forward & Backward Chaining
content: (Caption below the image) TensorFlow:  A free and open-source software library for machine learning.
image_desc:
The TensorFlow logo. Type: logo

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: TensorFlow is a powerful opensource tool developed by Google widely used in machine learning  We also have Forward Chaining where an AI system moves from a problem to a solution using rules and Backward Chaining which works backward from the desired output to find supporting evidence

title: Inductive Reasoning & Turing Test
content:
**Inductive Reasoning:** Uses data and proof to create statements and rules.
**Turing Test:** Evaluates a machine's ability to exhibit human-level intelligence.
image_desc:
An image depicting a brain with data streams flowing into it, representing inductive reasoning, alongside an image of Alan Turing. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Inductive reasoning uses data to generate rules and statements Finally the Turing Test devised by Alan Turing assesses a machine's capacity to demonstrate intelligence indistinguishable from a human's  This concludes our overview of key AI terms Thank you
